metadata.title: CVE-2024-0333 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient data validation in Extensions in Google Chrome prior to120.0.6099.216 allowed an attacker in a privileged network position toinstall a malicious extension via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium securityseverity: High)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
